title: Typefoundry on Gill's R
content: Fascinating blog republishing of James Mosley's 1990 article on an Italian source for Eric Gill's characteristic form of R is [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013111247/http:/typefoundry.blogspot.com/2009/12/eric-gills-r-italian-connection.html).
author: eliason
